pullup.title: Internal Pullup
pullup.description: If set, pull to 3.3V if possible

activeHigh.title: Active High
activeHigh.description: If unset, input is active when the voltage is low

activeTarget.title: Active Target
activeTarget.description: Variable to set when pin becomes active

inactiveTarget.title: Inactive Target
inactiveTarget.description: Variable to set when pin becomes inactive

deepSleepWake.title: Deep Sleep Wake
deepSleepWake.description: If set, pin will wake the device from deep sleep if it becomes active. Some pins may not support this, some chips may only allow one wake pin.
